SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: USR_USP_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYELIGIBILITY_BANGLADESHCONTACTABLECHILD
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Description: Used to add/delete 'Bangladesh contactable child' pending reasons.
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYELIGIBILITY_BANGLADESHCONTACTABLECHILD ( @childIDList dbo.USR_UDT_CHILDIDLIST readonly, -- The children to be made eligible or pending @changeAgentID uniqueidentifier, -- Used to specify change agent for CHANGEDBYID and ADDEDBYID fields @deletedRows int = 0 output, -- Output parm that specifies how many pending reasons were deleted @insertedRows int = 0 output -- Output parm that specifies how many pending reasons were inserted ) as begin -- Eligibility code value constants declare @eligibilityCode_Pending tinyint = 0 declare @eligibilityCode_Eligible tinyint = 1 declare @eligibilityCode_Ineligible tinyint = 2
declare @reasonTypeCode_ChildMarkPendingEligibility tinyint = 0 -- Child Mark Pending Eligibiltiy sponsorship reason enum
-- Get ChangeAgent if none was passed into the sproc if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output
-- Used for setting date fields to today's date declare @CurrentDate datetime = null set @CurrentDate = getdate()
begin try -- These are required for the sproc to work correctly, so we need to throw an exception if the IDs aren't found declare @bangladeshContactableNoteTypeID uniqueidentifier select @bangladeshContactableNoteTypeID = ID from dbo.SPROPPNOTETYPECODE where lower (DESCRIPTION) = lower ('Bangladesh contactable child') if @bangladeshContactableNoteTypeID is null raiserror('Couldn''t find the "Bangladesh contactable child" Note type code',16,1);
declare @bangladeshContactableReasonID uniqueidentifier select @bangladeshContactableReasonID = ID from dbo.SPONSORSHIPREASON where lower (REASON) = lower('Bangladesh contactable child') and REASONTYPECODE = @reasonTypeCode_ChildMarkPendingEligibility if @bangladeshContactableReasonID is null raiserror('Couldn''t find the "Bangladesh contactable child" Sponsorship Reason',16,1);
end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
-- This needs to be set to off for the output parms to be set properly SET NOCOUNT OFF
-- Remove 'Bangladesh contactable child' pending reasons if the 'Bangladesh contactable child' note does not exist for the child/children
delete dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYREASON from dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYREASON so_reason
where -- Find children who are specified to be reviewed and have the 'Bangladesh contactable child' pending reason exists (select SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID from @childIDList where SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID = so_reason.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID ) and so_reason.SPONSORSHIPREASONID = @bangladeshContactableReasonID
-- Check if a 'Bangladesh contactable child' note exists and not exists (select SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID from dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYNOTE so_note where so_note.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID = so_reason.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID and so_note.SPROPPNOTETYPECODEID = @bangladeshContactableNoteTypeID)
set @DELETEDROWS = @@ROWCOUNT
-- Insert 'Bangladesh contactable child' pending reasons if a child/children don't already have it and they have a 'Bangladesh contactable child' note insert dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYREASON (SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID, SPONSORSHIPREASONID, ADDEDBYID, CHANGEDBYID, DATEADDED, DATECHANGED)
select ID, @bangladeshContactableReasonID, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CurrentDate, @CurrentDate
from dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY so
where exists (select SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID from @childIDList where SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID = so.ID )
-- Verify that the children do not already have a 'Bangladesh contactable child' pending reason and not exists (select so_reason.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID from dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYREASON so_reason where so_reason.SPONSORSHIPREASONID = @bangladeshContactableReasonID and so_reason.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID = so.ID)
-- Check if a 'Bangladesh contactable child' note exists and exists (select SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID from dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYNOTE so_note where so_note.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID = so.ID and so_note.SPROPPNOTETYPECODEID = @bangladeshContactableNoteTypeID)
set @INSERTEDROWS = @@ROWCOUNT
end
